# Built application files
*.apk
*.aab

# Files for the Dalvik VM
*.dex

# Java class files
*.class

# Generated files
**/build/
.gradle/
**/local.properties
.idea/workspace.xml
.idea/gradle.xml
.idea/misc.xml
.idea/libraries/
.idea/modules.xml
*.iml
*.ipr
*.iws

# Local configuration files (sensitive information)
local.properties

# Log files
*.log

# Android Studio caches
.idea/caches/
.gradle/buildOutputCleanup/

# Keystore files (NEVER commit these!)
*.jks
*.keystore

# External native build folder generated in Android Studio 2.2 and later
.externalNativeBuild/

# Google Services (JSON file downloaded from Firebase Console)
# google-services.json # Decomentează dacă folosești și nu vrei să-l urci

# IntelliJ
*.suo
*.ntvs*
*.njsproj
*.sln
*.sw?

# Misc
.DS_Store # Mac specific
Thumbs.db # Windows specific
captures/ # Android Studio profiling data
*.hprof # Heap dumps
